00014         QWidget *parent, const char *name, WFlags f)

00022 void SkinButton::drawButton(QPainter *p)
00023 {
00024         const QPixmap *pm = pixmap();
00025         if(pm) p->drawPixmap(0, 0, *pm);
00026 }

00030         setPixmap(*pixActive);
00031         Down=true;
00032 }

00037         Down=false;

00040 void SkinButton::setPixmaps(QPixmap *regular, QPixmap *active)

00043         pixActive= active;
